about.description:
Passionate about development, I take real pleasure in designing applications that meet concrete needs.
I focus on back-end development, particularly creating APIs and deploying them through suitable solutions.
I also pay special attention to the user interface, to provide a refined, smooth, and accessible experience.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description: Technologies and tools I master to create modern web applications.
skills.fullstack: As a fullstack developer, I have gained experience in several areas such as frontend, backend, and even some motion design.
skills.preferencesIntro: Having worked on several projects with different technologies, my preference leans more towards:

preferences.architecture: Software architecture and development best practices
preferences.project: Overseeing projects globally (from design to production)

skills.interest: My interest is particularly focused on DevOps and DevSecOps, fields that truly inspire me.
skills.ambitionIntro: My ambition is to continue specializing in the cloud to:

ambitions.architecture: Improve my skills in cloud architecture
ambitions.solutions: Design solutions adapted to projects of all sizes
